Reviews.Content: conveniently located 4 star hotel tiny hopeless ok single occupancy hard bed rock hard conducive nights sleep bathrooms bathtub lift inadequate guests fit 7th floor staff helpful friendly incorrect information transport airport overall disappointed trip istanbul central palace price totally class altogether
